dialogue.text: Hello! Are you picking up a prescription?
dialogue.zh:
你好! 是 你 picking up a prescription?
こんにちは! Are あなた picking up a prescription?

是的, 我 am.
はい, 私 am.

dialogue.text: May I see your prescription, please?
dialogue.zh:
May 我 see your prescription, 請?
May 私 see your prescription, お願いします?

當然, here it 是.
もちろん, here it 私.

dialogue.text: Thank you. Is this your first time taking this medicine?
dialogue.zh:
謝謝 你. 是 this your first time taking this 藥?
ありがとう あなた. 私 this your first time taking this 薬?

是的, first time.
はい, first time.

dialogue.text: Okay. I’ll explain how to take it.
dialogue.zh:
好的. 我’ll explain how to take it.
わかりました. 私’ll explain how to take it.

謝謝 你.
ありがとう あなた.

dialogue.text: Take one pill after breakfast and one after dinner.
dialogue.zh:
Take one pill after breakfast and one after dinner.
Take one pill after breakfast and one after dinner.

Got it.
Got it.

dialogue.text: Do not take it on an empty stomach.
dialogue.zh:
not take it on an empty stomach.
Do not take it on an empty stomach.

好的.
わかりました.

任何 allergies to antibiotics?
Any allergies to antibiotics?

不.
いいえ.

dialogue.text: This may cause mild stomach upset.
dialogue.zh:
This may cause mild stomach upset.
This may cause mild stomach upset.

Alright.
Alright.

dialogue.text: If you get a rash, stop and call your doctor.
dialogue.zh:
If 你 get a rash, stop and call your doctor.
If あなた get a rash, stop and call your doctor.

好的.
わかりました.

dialogue.text: Do you need a measuring cup or anything?
dialogue.zh:
你 需要 a measuring cup or anything?
Do あなた 必要 a measuring cup or anything?

不, it’s pills.
いいえ, it’s pills.

請 finish the full course.
お願いします finish the full course.

我 will.
私 will.

你 有 任何 questions?
Do あなた have any questions?

dialogue.text: Can I drink coffee with it?
dialogue.zh:
可以 我 drink 咖啡 with it?
できます 私 drink コーヒー with it?

dialogue.text: Coffee is fine, but avoid alcohol.
dialogue.zh:
咖啡 是 fine, but avoid alcohol.
コーヒー 私 fine, but avoid alcohol.

好的.
わかりました.

dialogue.text: Your medicine will be ready in a few minutes.
dialogue.zh:
Your 藥 will be ready in a few minutes.
Your 薬 will be ready in a few minutes.

太好了.
いいですね.

dialogue.text: Here you go. Please double-check your name.
dialogue.zh:
Here 你 go. 請 double-check your name.
Here あなた go. お願いします double-check your name.

是的, that’s me.
はい, that’s me.
